articles.title: Biden: Israel’s Netanyahu making ‘mistake’ on Gaza - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: In strongest criticism yet, Biden takes issue with Israel’s approach but not its devastating war on Gaza.
articles.content:
United States President Joe Biden has said Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is making a mistake in his handling of the Gaza war and its repercussions inside Israel and internationally.

articles.title: CERN pays tribute to Peter Higgs - CERN
articles.description: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning achievement of the Standard Model (SM) of particle physics – …

articles.title: Children of the Sun Review - IGN
articles.description: This slick and shrewd supernatural sniping game is packed with satisfying spatial problems to solve (and shoot), but it's not significantly satisfying after the first time around.
